blogData.title: Next.js Create Smooth Theme Transition with Gsap
blogData.desdescription: Learn how to create a seamless, visually appealing experience for users switching between themes on your website. This post dives into implementing smooth transitions between light and dark themes using gsap.

img.alt: Smooth theme transition by xiaohu on October 18, 2024

blogData.title: Create Accordion Component with Tailwind Css
blogData.desdescription: Learn how to build a fully functional accordion using only Tailwind CSS, with NO JavaScript! This guide will walk you through creating an interactive, responsive accordion component that's lightweight and easy to implement.

img.alt: Create accordion with tailwind css with no Javascript by xiaohu on October 21, 2024

blogData.title: How to Create an Animated Dashed Line with GSAP
blogData.desdescription: Learn how to create a dynamic, animated dashed line using GSAP. This tutorial will guide you step-by-step in bringing your designs to life with smooth and eye-catching animations.

img.alt: Create Animated Dashed Line with GSAP & SVG by xiaohu on October 24, 2024
